title: About Waltz
content:
Waltz, sometimes referred to as `Architecture on the Wire', is a Group Architecture tool that provides architecture-related information to a broad spectrum of DB consumers. Waltz acquires, aggregates and presents data from a set of distinct authoritative/golden sources to provide insights into the state of DB's data, application and technology assets.

To measure the progress towards DB's strategic goals, Waltz provides a set of indicators that include KPI's and KRI's (Key Performance / Risk Indicators) which can be accessed from any of the tabs at the top of the screen.

Waltz is not an alternative to existing architecture-related solutions in DB (such as PowerDesigner, Sparx or other Enterprise Architecture tool); it complements these solutions and enables integration with them as the need arises.

More information about Waltz is available on the Waltz Confluence Site. If you have any questions, observations or suggestions please direct them to the Waltz team

title: New to Waltz?
content:
- Register your interest for a Waltz introductory webinar from the [Architecture Training page](https://mydb.intranet.db.com/events/124956)
- Discover how to perform common tasks with the [Waltz step-by-step guide](https://confluence.intranet.db.com/display/CTCTOWALTZ/Waltz+Guide)
- Got a question? Check out the [Waltz FAQ](https://confluence.intranet.db.com/display/CTCTOWALTZ/FAQs)
- Contact [Waltz Support](mailto:Waltz.Support@db.com)
